hero.title: Dignified Care for
hero.description: Compassionate, professional home care services designed to help seniors maintain their independence and quality of life in the comfort of their own homes. We accept private pay and insurance.

packages.name: Classic
packages.subtitle: Essential Support
packages.description: Companionship, light personal care, and assistance with Activities of Daily Living (ADLs).

packages.name: Signature
packages.subtitle: Enhanced Care
packages.description: Includes all Classic features plus hands-on care, specialized routines, and regular family updates.

packages.name: Premier
packages.subtitle: Advanced Care
packages.description: Includes all Signature features plus advanced care needs and dementia support.

servicesList.title: Companion Care
servicesList.description: Alleviating loneliness with meaningful conversation, activity engagement, and social support.

servicesList.title: Personal Care
servicesList.description: Respectful assistance with activities of daily living like bathing, dressing, and hygiene.

servicesList.title: Respite Care
servicesList.description: Temporary relief for primary caregivers, ensuring your loved one is safe while you recharge.

cta.title: Discuss Your Care Options
cta.description: Every senior's needs are unique. Call us to discuss our packages, pricing, and insurance coverage options.
